snippet: FRIEDMAN--Jessie, age 62, of Manhattan, passed away January 31, 2016. Jessie was a devoted father, husband and friend who was also a sports enthusiast, gifted sto- ryteller and an inspiration to all who knew him. Jessie, you will be greatly missed. Friends from the Stuyvesant Town neighborhood and Tiana Bay Estates 1/3
lead_paragraph: FRIEDMAN--Jessie, age 62, of Manhattan, passed away January 31, 2016.
